001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc;
002
003import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
004import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcStatusException;
005
006import java.io.IOException;
007import java.util.List;
008
009/**
010 * Interface for a Bitcoin JSON-RPC client that implements {@code getchaintips}.
011 * <p>
012 * (This is needed to provide reactive Bitcoin JSON-RPC interfaces since we can't
013 * use BitcoinClient itself because it is concrete. In the future we may want to create
014 * interfaces with more Bitcoin RPC methods, but for now this is all we need.)
015 */
016public interface ChainTipClient {
017    List<ChainTip> getChainTips() throws JsonRpcStatusException, IOException;
018}
